title: Dare To Fall
description: Arabella GrayStudious. Good Girl. Liar.She's become my addiction—I feed her my pain.When the threat of losing her awakens the monster, there is no one left to save her from me.Eli TraversOutcast. Artist. Monster.I fell in love with my stepbrother—the Monster.I crave his touch and loathe his name. He took everything I gave and twisted it with hate.The past rises from the dead and stalks the living. Shadows will overtake the light, while blood and darkness coat the walls of Churchill Bradley Academy.Can new found love save them all, or will the monster win in the end?
author: L. Ann
